title: Ben Hur
creator_credit: Ken Adam, William Wyler, Sam Zimbalist, United Artists Corporation and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
brief_description: Winner of 11 Academy Awards. A first-rate biblical epic packed with action. The chariot race is an all-time achievement in film editing and one of the greatest action scenes in motion pictures. Stars Charlton Heston as Ben Hur. Based on the novel by Lew Wallace.
